package.name: Solar
package.summary: Simple object library and application repository for PHP.
package.description:
Solar is a class library and application component suite for PHP 5 (and is PHP5 E_STRICT compliant). Solar provides simple, easy-to-comprehend classes and components for the common aspects of web-based rapid application development.
Solar is designed for developers who intend to distribute their applications to the whole world. This means, for example, the database driver functions work exactly the same way for each supported database. It also means that localization support is built in from the start.
Please visit http://solarphp.com/ for more information.

release.notes:
* Standards changes
* replace() is now save()
* fetchItem() is now just fetch(); typical param is a unique id, or no param at all to get next item in a stack.
* fetchList() is now fetchAll(); typical params are query components.
* fetchFor() and fetchWith() are now fetchBy()
* fetchBy*() and fetchAllBy*() are for specific fetch constraints; e.g., fetchByName() or fetchAllByRelatedId()
* Specific changes using new standards:
* Solar_Content_Bookmarks::fetchItem() is now ::fetch()
* Solar_Content_Bookmarks::fetchList() is now ::fetchAll()
* Solar_Content_Bookmarks::fetchOwnerUri() is now ::fetchByOwnerUri()
* Solar_Model_Areas::fetchWithName() is now ::fetchByName()
* Solar_Cache*::replace() is now ::save()
* Solar_Model_Tags::fetchForNode() is now ::fetchByNodeId()
* Solar_Model_Comments::fetchItem() is now ::fetch()
* Solar_Content_Abstract::fetchItem() is now ::fetch()
* Solar_Content_Abstract::fetchList() is now ::fetchAll()
* Using Solar::loadClass() instead of require_once
* Greater consistency and standardization in locale keys (see Solar/Locale notes)
* Config keys now standardize on the word 'driver' to indicate a driver class (vice 'class'); this affects Solar_Sql, Solar_Cache, Solar_User_Auth, and Solar_User_Role
* When passing in a separate driver config, now use the key 'config' (vice 'options'); this affects Solar_User_Auth and Solar_User_Role
* Added new classes
* Solar_View: a Solar-specific "flavor" of Savant3 to more efficiently integrate with Solar; replaces Solar_Template
* Solar_View_Helper: Helper classes for Solar_View that improve on default Savant3 helpers in the Solar environment
* Solar_PathStack: used for plugin directory fallback management
* Solar_App: extension of Solar_Controller_Page for all Solar apps to provide default layout variables
* Removed classes
* Solar_Template; migration notes are (old => new)
* Solar_Template => Solar_View
* $tpl->addPath('template', ...) => $view->addTemplatePath(...)
* $tpl->addPath('resource', ...) => $view->addHelperPath(...)
* $this->eprint() => echo $this->escape()
* $this->locale() => $this->getText() || $this->getTextRaw()
* $this->eprint($this->locale(...)) => echo $this->getText(...)
* $this->actionLink() => $this->action()
* $this->ahref() => $this->anchor()
* Renamed classes
* Solar_App_HelloWorld is now Solar_App_Hello
* Solar
* No longer using __FILE__ based directory paths in loadClass() etc; was a dumb idea, makes it too hard to collect libs from different dirs.
* Renamed _environment() to _globalsQuotes() to more accurately reflect what it does
* Solar_Base
* Removed add/set/getFlash(), moved to individual classes that actually need them (Solar_Controller_Page and Solar_User_Auth)
* Solar_App_Bookmarks
* now extends Solar_App instead of Solar_Controller_Page (this gives standard $layout_* variables)
* Converted views to Solar_View conventions
* minor changes to view styles
* fixed bug in edit.action.php when deleting (using 'bookmarks' key, should have been 'bookmark')
* edit.action.php now sets the editor_handle, instead of the model doing it
* removed extra <div> from browse.view.php
* updated locale strings, uses new standardized locale keys (e.g., 'SUBMIT_SAVE' instead of 'OP_SAVE')
* updated actions to use new layout variables
* uses new _action_info mappings (strings vice arrays)
* 'userFeed' action is now 'user-feed' (and located at user/feed.action.php)
* 'tagFeed' action is now 'tag-feed' (and located at tag/feed.action.php)
* Added (empty) Public/ directory
* Solar_App_Hello
* Updated views to use Solar_View conventions
* Added (empty) Public/ directory
* Solar_Cache:
* no longer uses 'options' key to configure the driver; instead, just pass driver config as part of cache config
* Solar_Content_Bookmarks
* bugfix: fetchByOwnerUri() method now actually fetches a result
* Solar_Controller_Front
* Now a very light class only for dispatching to proper page-controller
* removed script hooks entirely; extend Solar_Controller_Front to override _setup() and __destruct() for similar behaviors
* no longer doing __FILE__ based directory finding
* Moved all layout handling to page-controller level
* No longer using direct app-to-class mapping; instead, using 'classes' with class prefixes, and the front controller looks for a matching name automatically
* The 'app_default' key renamed to 'default' (for default page name)
* Solar_Controller_Page
* No longer doing __FILE__ based directory mapping
* Now uses Solar_View instead of Solar_Template
* Uses Solar::fileExists() instead of is_readable() now
* Layout handling moved in from front-controller
* New $_layout property is the layout name, default is 'twoColRight'
* New $_layout_dir property is where layouts are located, default is 'Solar/Layout/'
* New $_layout_var property is the name of the content variable in the layout
* The fetch() method now monolithic; renders the view, then renders the layout using the view content. May refactor this later.
* Removed _view() method
* Layouts take their vars from the page itself
* Changed _action_info mapping format; used to be an array of arrays, is now a simpler key-value pair array where the key is the action, and the value is a string of slash-separated info var names with defaults embedded; e.g., array('list' => 'year=2005/month=01/day=01').
* Added short-name property so that when the page controller is being used in standalone, front-controller based URIs will still work properly.
* Added _setup() method
* Now allows for info mapping on default actions
* Added flash methods internally, instead of being inherited from Solar_Base
* Solar_Filter
* no longer static (must instantiate!)
* renamed custom() method to callback()
* Solar_Form
* Now uses Valid and Filter instances, vice static calls to those objects
* Added config keys 'success' and 'failure' to indicate what form-level feedback message should be automatically added on validate() calls
* $this->attribs now resets properly from $this->_config['attribs']
* calling populate() now resets previously submitted values
* Solar/Locale/
* changed 'OP_*' to 'SUBMIT_*'
* changed 'ERR_FORM' and 'ERR_INVALID' to 'FAILURE_FORM' and 'FAILURE_INVALID'; the 'ERR_*' should be for exception messages
* changed 'OK_*' to 'SUCCESS_*'
* changed 'TEXT_LOGIN' and 'TEXT_LOGOUT' to 'SUBMIT_LOGIN' and 'SUBMIT_LOGOUT'
* changed generic 'LABEL_*' keys from '_OP', '_USERNAME', '_PASSWORD' to '_SUBMIT', '_HANDLE', 'PASSWD'
* Solar/Layout/
* layout scripts now use Solar_View conventions
* added 'twoColLeft', 'twoColRight', and 'threeCol' layout scripts; semi-semantic, table-based
* added related stylesheets for layout scripts in Public/*
* added head.part.php to partition <head> content
* auth.part.php is now all CSS all the time
* Solar_Model_Nodes
* removed registry() calls for default values, as model classes should not expect a registry to be available
* Solar_Sql:
* uses 'driver' instead of 'class' key now
* Solar_Uri
* added $_config array with keys for 'action' and 'public'
* exportAction() now prefixes with $_config['action'] value
* added exportPublic() method; identical to exportAction() but prefixed with $_config['public']
* importAction() now strips the action prefix from the imported URI (if an action prefix is specified)
* Solar_User_Role_Sql
* fixed bug: was using old Sql::fetchCol(), now Sql::select('col') ... thanks, Jeff Surgeson
* Solar_User
* Uses Solar::dependency() to load Auth and Role objects
* Solar_User_Auth
* renamed config keys (old => new)
* class => driver
* options => config
* post_username => post_handle (default value 'handle')
* post_password => post_passwd (default value 'passwd')
* post_op => post_submit (default value 'submit')
* op_login => submit_login (default value is now the SUBMIT_LOGIN locale value)
* op_logout => submit_logout (default value is now the SUBMIT_LOGOUT locale value)
* renamed properties (old => new)
* $username => $handle
* $last_active => $active
* $status_code => $status
* $login_time => $initial
* Solar_User_Auth_Sql
* renamed config keys and default values
* 'username_col' is now 'handle_col' and defaults to 'handle'
* 'password_col' is now 'passwd_col' and defaults to 'passwd'
* 'table' now defaults to 'members' (vice 'sc_users')
* Solar_User_Auth_Post
* config key 'username' is now 'handle' (defaults to 'handle')
* config key 'password' is now 'passwd' (defaults to 'passwd')
* Solar_User_Role:
* changed config key 'class' to 'driver'
* changed config key 'options' to 'config'
* Solar_Valid
* no longer static (must instantiate!)
* renamed custom() method to callback()

* General
* added narrative inline documentation to many classes in prep for automatic doc generation
* Solar/Layout -- renamed auth.php to auth.part.php
* REMOVED CLASSES:
* Solar_Error (in favor of exceptions)
* Solar_Locale (wrapped functionality into Solar and Solar_Base since the "shared" object model has changed)
* Moved Solar_Model_Bookmarks to Solar_Content_Bookmarks
* Solar
* protected StdClass $_shared is now public array $registry
* Auto-shared object creation has been removed entirely, you should use a Solar_Controller_Front 'construct' hook or a Solar::start() hook to create and register objects
* Renamed Solar::shared() to Solar::registry(), and changed all calls throughout the codebase
* Added new register() method to add objects to the registry
* Added new inRegistry() methods to see if an object exists in the registry already
* Added new dependency() method to standardize dependency injections (typically SQL objects)
* Solar::start() and Solar::stop() no longer manage auto-shared objects (except for a Solar_Locale object); the related functionality has been moved to Solar_Controller_Front
* Added ::setLocale() and ::getLocale() methods to set and get the locale code (all other code now uses this instead of Solar::shared('locale')->reset())
* Added base $config array, start() now merges these with added configs
* Added public $locale property to hold locale strings (vice a publicly registered Solar_Locale object)
* Added protected $_locale_code property.
* Added "flash" read-once messaging methods: setFlash(), addFlash(), getFlash()
* To support flash-forward messaging, Solar::start() now calls @session_start()
* Solar_App_Bookmarks
* Refactored all views to use TwoStepView; i.e., views now use the front-controller layout, not their own headers and footers
* RSS feeds for users (i.e., what used to be "user/.../?rss=1") are now accessed via the new "userFeed" action
* RSS feeds for tags (i.e., what used to be "tag/.../?rss=1") are now accessed via the new "tagFeed" action
* Added "feed.view.php" for RSS feeds; these do not use the front-controller layout
* Split 'edit' action into multiple parts for easier comprehension: 'add', 'edit', and 'quick' are now separate actions
* Renamed 'list' action and view to 'browse'
* Split 'browse' view into a main view and partial views for easier comprehension
* Trying to use actionLink() helper more (vs building links with Solar_Uri)
* Using flash forwards to retain backlinks now (vs propagating in the URI)
* Changed Javascript "quickmark" uri generator (now uses the 'quick' action instead of 'edit')'
* Clicking on "delete" now triggers a confirmation dialog
* Uses the new content domain model and the Solar_Content_Bookmarks class (vice the previous Solar_Model_Bookmarks class)
* The Bookmarks controller now has a $_user property (for the registered Solar_User object)
* The Bookmarks controller now has a $_bookmarks property (for the Solar_Content_Bookmarks obejct)
* The Bookmarks controller has new $_config keys (one for the 'area_name' and one for the 'content' Solar_Content dependency)
* The Bookmarks controller itself now creates the bookmarks area based on the $_config['area_name'] value.
* The default bookmarks area is now "Solar_App_Bookmarks" vice "Solar_Model_Bookmarks". You should issue "UPDATE areas SET name = 'Solar_App_Bookmarks' WHERE name = 'Solar_Model_Bookmarks'" in your database to update to the new name.
* In all actions, now using $this->_bookmarks and $this->_user instead of creating objects in the action.
* In all actions, reversed $tags and $owner_handle params in fetchList() and coutnPages() calls to be in line with the new Solar_Content_Bookmarks method signatures* Solar_App_HelloWorld
* Now uses TwoStepView and site layout
* Solar_Base
* removed solar() method entirely, as the auto-shared object behavior from Solar::start() has been removed
* Added "flash" read-once messaging methods: setFlash(), addFlash(), getFlash()
* Solar_Content
* Moved all methods to Solar_Content_Abstract for node type management
* Little more than a collection point for the content tables now (areas, nodes, tags)
* Solar_Content_Abstract
* Acts as a base class for content node types
* Renamed paging() to setPaging()
* Added getPaging() method to get the paging value
* Renamed fetchTagList() to fetchTags()
* Solar_Content_Bookmarks
* Moved from Solar_Model_Bookmarks
* Now extends Solar_Content_Abstract, moved methods common to all nodes into Solar_Content_Abstract
* No longer checks Solar::get() for default values
* No longer creates its own area
* The fetch*() methods with a $tags param now use it as the first param (consistent with Solar_Content_Abstract)
* Solar_Controller_Front
* Two new config keys, 'layout' and 'output_var', added to support two-step view
* 'layout_dir' is the path to the layout directory
* 'layout_tpl' is the name of the layout in that directory, minus the .layout.php extension
* 'layout_var' is the name of the variable in the layout template that represents the page-level output
* added 'construct' and 'destruct' script hooks
* constructor automatically registers 'user' (Solar_User) and 'sql' (Solar_Sql) objects in the registry
* Added pseudo-404 error message when app name is not recognized.
* Now supports two-step views when $this->_layout is non-false.
* Solar_Controller_Page
* renamed protected $_basedir to protected $_dir
* fetch() is now the only method to call _collect() for populating info and query values
* _forward() now only forwards to an action using the current properties; it does not call _collect() on the forward $spec any more
* added $_layout and getLayout() methods to facilitate handing data back to the Front Controller for a two-step view (you can set $this->_layout to false to force a one-step view)
* improved _info() and _query() key checking
* added new _preAction() method to run before the first action
* added new _postAction() to run after the last action and before the view
* moved view-generation code to _view() method (which makes it much more "pluggable")
* Now uses the most-recent action as the view name (vs the first action called)
* Now converts "actions-named-thusly" (with dashes) to "actionsNamedThusly" (camel case), so that prettier URLs map to the proper action file.
* Solar_Debug_Timer
* added config key 'auto_start' along with related __construct() behavior to start the timer automatically
* added config key 'auto_display' along with related __destruct() behavior display the timer profile
* Solar_Form
* Form-level attributes (action, method, entype) are now in config array under their own key ($_config['attribs'])
* Added two new config keys, 'success' and 'failure', for automated form-level validation messages
* Solar_Form_Load_Table
* now uses Solar_Sql_Table::fetchDefault() instead of getDefault()
* Solar_Form_Load_Xml
* bugfix (extra comma at the end of a function call)
* Solar_Model_Areas
* added fetchWithName() method to fetch one area with a given name
* Solar_Model_Bookmarks
* MOVED to Solar_Content_Bookmarks
* Solar_Sql_Select
* public $sql property has been made protected $_sql
* Solar_Sql_Table
* renamed getDefault() to fetchDefault(), and now it always returns an entire default row (instead of allowing just for some columns)
* fetchDefault() returns the 'created' and 'updated' fields now
* Solar_Template
* actionLink plugin now properly prepends front-controller path (thanks Stuardo Rodriguez)
* Solar_User
* removed solar() method, authentication startup now happens in the constructor
* Solar_User_Auth
* Now uses flash forwarding to propagate status text (no longer a part of the Solar_User_Auth session key)
* Valid logins now show an initial welcome message
* Solar_Valid
* Now using Solar_Valid::CONSTANT in function signatures instead of self::CONSTANT (errors when doing reflection)

* Standards changes
* replace() is now save()
* fetchItem() is now just fetch(); typical param is a unique id, or no param at all to get next item in a stack.
* fetchList() is now fetchAll(); typical params are query components.
* fetchFor() and fetchWith() are now fetchBy()
* fetchBy*() and fetchAllBy*() are for specific fetch constraints; e.g., fetchByName() or fetchAllByRelatedId()
* Specific changes using new standards:
* Solar_Content_Bookmarks::fetchItem() is now ::fetch()
* Solar_Content_Bookmarks::fetchList() is now ::fetchAll()
* Solar_Content_Bookmarks::fetchOwnerUri() is now ::fetchByOwnerUri()
* Solar_Model_Areas::fetchWithName() is now ::fetchByName()
* Solar_Cache*::replace() is now ::save()
* Solar_Model_Tags::fetchForNode() is now ::fetchByNodeId()
* Solar_Model_Comments::fetchItem() is now ::fetch()
* Solar_Content_Abstract::fetchItem() is now ::fetch()
* Solar_Content_Abstract::fetchList() is now ::fetchAll()
* Using Solar::loadClass() instead of require_once
* Greater consistency and standardization in locale keys (see Solar/Locale notes)
* Config keys now standardize on the word 'driver' to indicate a driver class (vice 'class'); this affects Solar_Sql, Solar_Cache, Solar_User_Auth, and Solar_User_Role
* When passing in a separate driver config, now use the key 'config' (vice 'options'); this affects Solar_User_Auth and Solar_User_Role
* Added new classes
* Solar_View: a Solar-specific "flavor" of Savant3 to more efficiently integrate with Solar; replaces Solar_Template
* Solar_View_Helper: Helper classes for Solar_View that improve on default Savant3 helpers in the Solar environment
* Solar_PathStack: used for plugin directory fallback management
* Solar_App: extension of Solar_Controller_Page for all Solar apps to provide default layout variables
* Removed classes
* Solar_Template; migration notes are (old => new)
* Solar_Template => Solar_View
* $tpl->addPath('template', ...) => $view->addTemplatePath(...)
* $tpl->addPath('resource', ...) => $view->addHelperPath(...)
* $this->eprint() => echo $this->escape()
* $this->locale() => $this->getText() || $this->getTextRaw()
* $this->eprint($this->locale(...)) => echo $this->getText(...)
* $this->actionLink() => $this->action()
* $this->ahref() => $this->anchor()
* Renamed classes
* Solar_App_HelloWorld is now Solar_App_Hello
* Solar
* No longer using __FILE__ based directory paths in loadClass() etc; was a dumb idea, makes it too hard to collect libs from different dirs.
* Renamed _environment() to _globalsQuotes() to more accurately reflect what it does
* Solar_Base
* Removed add/set/getFlash(), moved to individual classes that actually need them (Solar_Controller_Page and Solar_User_Auth)
* Solar_App_Bookmarks
* now extends Solar_App instead of Solar_Controller_Page (this gives standard $layout_* variables)
* Converted views to Solar_View conventions
* minor changes to view styles
* fixed bug in edit.action.php when deleting (using 'bookmarks' key, should have been 'bookmark')
* edit.action.php now sets the editor_handle, instead of the model doing it
* removed extra <div> from browse.view.php
* updated locale strings, uses new standardized locale keys (e.g., 'SUBMIT_SAVE' instead of 'OP_SAVE')
* updated actions to use new layout variables
* uses new _action_info mappings (strings vice arrays)
* 'userFeed' action is now 'user-feed' (and located at user/feed.action.php)
* 'tagFeed' action is now 'tag-feed' (and located at tag/feed.action.php)
* Added (empty) Public/ directory
* Solar_App_Hello
* Updated views to use Solar_View conventions
* Added (empty) Public/ directory
* Solar_Cache:
* no longer uses 'options' key to configure the driver; instead, just pass driver config as part of cache config
* Solar_Content_Bookmarks
* bugfix: fetchByOwnerUri() method now actually fetches a result
* Solar_Controller_Front
* Now a very light class only for dispatching to proper page-controller
* removed script hooks entirely; extend Solar_Controller_Front to override _setup() and __destruct() for similar behaviors
* no longer doing __FILE__ based directory finding
* Moved all layout handling to page-controller level
* No longer using direct app-to-class mapping; instead, using 'classes' with class prefixes, and the front controller looks for a matching name automatically
* The 'app_default' key renamed to 'default' (for default page name)
* Solar_Controller_Page
* No longer doing __FILE__ based directory mapping
* Now uses Solar_View instead of Solar_Template
* Uses Solar::fileExists() instead of is_readable() now
* Layout handling moved in from front-controller
* New $_layout property is the layout name, default is 'twoColRight'
* New $_layout_dir property is where layouts are located, default is 'Solar/Layout/'
* New $_layout_var property is the name of the content variable in the layout
* The fetch() method now monolithic; renders the view, then renders the layout using the view content. May refactor this later.
* Removed _view() method
* Layouts take their vars from the page itself
* Changed _action_info mapping format; used to be an array of arrays, is now a simpler key-value pair array where the key is the action, and the value is a string of slash-separated info var names with defaults embedded; e.g., array('list' => 'year=2005/month=01/day=01').
* Added short-name property so that when the page controller is being used in standalone, front-controller based URIs will still work properly.
* Added _setup() method
* Now allows for info mapping on default actions
* Added flash methods internally, instead of being inherited from Solar_Base
* Solar_Filter
* no longer static (must instantiate!)
* renamed custom() method to callback()
* Solar_Form
* Now uses Valid and Filter instances, vice static calls to those objects
* Added config keys 'success' and 'failure' to indicate what form-level feedback message should be automatically added on validate() calls
* $this->attribs now resets properly from $this->_config['attribs']
* calling populate() now resets previously submitted values
* Solar/Locale/
* changed 'OP_*' to 'SUBMIT_*'
* changed 'ERR_FORM' and 'ERR_INVALID' to 'FAILURE_FORM' and 'FAILURE_INVALID'; the 'ERR_*' should be for exception messages
* changed 'OK_*' to 'SUCCESS_*'
* changed 'TEXT_LOGIN' and 'TEXT_LOGOUT' to 'SUBMIT_LOGIN' and 'SUBMIT_LOGOUT'
* changed generic 'LABEL_*' keys from '_OP', '_USERNAME', '_PASSWORD' to '_SUBMIT', '_HANDLE', 'PASSWD'
* Solar/Layout/
* layout scripts now use Solar_View conventions
* added 'twoColLeft', 'twoColRight', and 'threeCol' layout scripts; semi-semantic, table-based
* added related stylesheets for layout scripts in Public/*
* added head.part.php to partition <head> content

* removed registry() calls for default values, as model classes should not expect a registry to be available
* Solar_Sql:
* uses 'driver' instead of 'class' key now
* Solar_Uri
* added $_config array with keys for 'action' and 'public'
* exportAction() now prefixes with $_config['action'] value
* added exportPublic() method; identical to exportAction() but prefixed with $_config['public']
* importAction() now strips the action prefix from the imported URI (if an action prefix is specified)
* Solar_User_Role_Sql
* fixed bug: was using old Sql::fetchCol(), now Sql::select('col') ... thanks, Jeff Surgeson
* Solar_User
* Uses Solar::dependency() to load Auth and Role objects
* Solar_User_Auth
* renamed config keys (old => new)
* class => driver
* options => config
* post_username => post_handle (default value 'handle')
* post_password => post_passwd (default value 'passwd')
* post_op => post_submit (default value 'submit')
* op_login => submit_login (default value is now the SUBMIT_LOGIN locale value)
* op_logout => submit_logout (default value is now the SUBMIT_LOGOUT locale value)

* $username => $handle
* $last_active => $active

* renamed config keys and default values
* 'username_col' is now 'handle_col' and defaults to 'handle'
* 'password_col' is now 'passwd_col' and defaults to 'passwd'
* 'table' now defaults to 'members' (vice 'sc_users')
* Solar_User_Auth_Post
* config key 'username' is now 'handle' (defaults to 'handle')
* config key 'password' is now 'passwd' (defaults to 'passwd')
* Solar_User_Role:
* changed config key 'class' to 'driver'
* changed config key 'options' to 'config'
* Solar_Valid
* no longer static (must instantiate!)
* renamed custom() method to callback()
